Is acute promyelocytic leukemia inherited ?,Acute promyelocytic leukemia is not inherited but arises from a translocation in the body's cells that occurs after conception.,GHR,acute promyelocytic leukemia
What are the treatments for acute promyelocytic leukemia ?,These resources address the diagnosis or management of acute promyelocytic leukemia:  - American Cancer Society
